scripts.build:all: bun run build:core && bun run build:provider && bun run build:template && bun run build:messaging && bun run build:analytics && bun run build:channel && bun run build:webhook && bun run build:k-msg
scripts.test:all: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration
scripts.typecheck:all: bun run --cwd packages/core build:types && bun run --cwd packages/provider build:types && bun run --cwd packages/template build:types && bun run --cwd packages/messaging build:types && bun run --filter='./packages/*' typecheck && bun run --cwd apps/cli typecheck
scripts.check:ci: bun run typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/messaging build && bun run test:unit && bun run build:all && bun run test:integration && bun run --cwd apps/cli test && bun run --cwd apps/cli build
scripts.deps:outdated:core: for d in . apps/cli packages/*; do [ -f "$d/package.json" ] || continue; echo "\n===== $d ====="; (cd "$d" && bun outdated || true); done
scripts.deps:outdated:examples: for d in examples/*; do [ -f "$d/package.json" ] || continue; echo "\n===== $d ====="; (cd "$d" && bun outdated || true); done
scripts.release:patch: bun run version:patch && bun install && bun run build:all && bun run publish:all
scripts.release:minor: bun run version:minor && bun install && bun run build:all && bun run publish:all
scripts.release:major: bun run version:major && bun install && bun run build:all && bun run publish:all
scripts.docs:dev: bun run docs:generate && bun run --cwd apps/docs dev
scripts.docs:build: bun run docs:generate && bun run --cwd apps/docs build && bun run docs:postbuild:sitemap
scripts.docs:check: bun run --cwd apps/cli schema:check && bun run scripts/docs/run-generate.ts --check && bun run --cwd apps/docs snippets:typecheck && bun run --cwd apps/docs check && bun run --cwd apps/docs build && bun run docs:postbuild:sitemap
